name: Ikki
info:
• 性别: 女
  • 生日: 163 AG
  • 种族: Air Nomad; Water Tribe
  • 国籍: Republic City, United Republic
  • 声优: Darcy Rose Byrnes
detail: Ikki is the second child and youngest daughter of Tenzin and Pema, and the granddaughter of Avatar Aang and Katara. She has three siblings: an older sister named Jinora and two younger brothers named Meelo and Rohan. The entire family resides on Air Temple Island, near Republic City. Ikki is fun-loving, energetic, and extremely talkative.
